<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete a Modifier</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/pcm/pricebooks/{pricebookID}/modifiers/{modifierID}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Deletes the specified price book modifier.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"pricebookID","in":"path","description":"Unique identifier of a Price Book","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"modifierID","in":"path","description":"Unique identifier of a Price Book Modifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"204"} value={"204"}><div>

A 204 response indicates that the price modifiers have been deleted

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"default"} value={"default"}><div>

Unexpected error.
